Definition: To agree is to have the same opinion or belief as another person.
Example: The students agree they have too much homework.

Definition: Alcohol is a type of drink that can make people drunk.
Example: A person should not drive a car after he or she has been drinking alcohol.

Definition: To arrive is to get somewhere.
Example: They arrived at school at 7 a.m.

Definition: August is the eighth month of the year.
Example: Is your birthday in August?

Definition: A boat is a vehicle that moves across water.
Example: There is a small boat on the lake.

Definition: Breakfast is the morning meal.
Example: I ate eggs for breakfast.

Definition: A camera is a piece of equipment that takes pictures.
Example: I brought my camera on my vacation.

Definition: A capital is a city where a country’s government is based.
Example: The capital of the United States is Washington, D.C.

Definition: To catch is to grab or get something.
Example: Did you catch the ball during the baseball game?

Definition: A duck is a small water bird.
Example: People feed ducks at the lake.

Definition: To enjoy is to like something.
Example: The woman enjoys riding her bicycle.

Definition: To invite is to ask someone to come to a place or event.
Example: I will invite my friends to my birthday party.

Definition: To love is to like something or someone a lot.
Example: I love my family very much.

Definition: A month is one of 12 periods of time in one year.
Example: January is the first month of the year.

Definition: To travel is to go to a faraway place on vacation or business.
Example: They will travel to Argentina this summer.

Definition: If something is typical, it is normal, or something that usually happens.
Example: My typical breakfast is toast and eggs.

Definition: To visit is to go and spend time in another place or see another person.
Example: She wants to visit her grandmother.

Definition: Weather is the temperature and the state of the outdoors.
Example: Today’s weather is rainy and cloudy.

Definition: A week is a period of time that is seven days long.
Example: What are you doing next week?

Definition: Wine is an alcoholic drink made from grapes.
Example: The store carried both red and white wine.

Definition: An adventure is a fun or exciting thing that you do.
Example: Riding in the rough water was an adventure.

Definition: To approach something means to move close to it.
Example: The boy approached his school.

Definition: Carefully means with great attention, especially to detail or safety.
Example: The baby carefully climbed down the stairs.

Definition: A chemical is something that scientists use in chemistry.
Example: The scientist mixed the chemicals.

Definition: To create means to make something new.
Example: She created an igloo from blocks of snow.

Definition: Evil describes something or someone bad or cruel, not good.
Example: They felt a strange, evil presence as they got closer to the house.

Definition: An experiment is a test that you do to see what will happen.
Example: The student did an experiment in science class.

Definition: To kill someone or something is to make them die.
Example: I killed the fly.

Definition: A laboratory is a room where a scientist works.
Example: My mother works in a laboratory.

Definition: Laugh is the sound made when someone is happy or a funny thing occurs.
Example: The sound of her laugh filled the room.

Definition: If a sound is loud, it is strong and very easy to hear.
Example: The man’s voice was so loud that we all could hear him.

Definition: When a person is nervous, they think something bad will happen.
Example: The boy became nervous when he heard the news.

Definition: A noise is an unpleasant sound.
Example: The crying baby made a loud noise.

Definition: A project is a type of work that you do for school or a job.
Example: His afternoon work project was to paint the room green.

Definition: To scare someone is to make them feel afraid.
Example: My uncle was scared by what he saw in the room.

Definition: A secret is something that you do not tell other people.
Example: The two boys were sharing a secret.

Definition: To shout is to say something loudly.
Example: My boss shouted at me because I was late for work.

Definition: To smell something means to use your nose to sense it.
Example: The two friends smelled the flower.

Definition: If something is terrible, it is very bad.
Example: The way he treated his classmate was terrible.

Definition: If something is worse, it is of poorer quality than another thing.
Example: Business was worse this month than last month.

Definition: An alien is a creature from a different world.
Example: The alien came in peace.

Definition: If you are among certain things, they are all around you.
Example: There was a red apple among the green ones.

Definition: A chart is a list of information.
Example: We used a chart to see how we had improved.

Definition: A cloud is a group of water drops in the sky.
Example: The sky was filled with white clouds.

Definition: To describe is to say or write what someone or something is like.
Example: They described their tree as colorful, with gold ribbon and a star.

Definition: Ever means at any time.
Example: Going skiing last winter was the most fun I’ve ever had.

Definition: To fail means you do not succeed in what you try to do.
Example: Since he failed to get the job, he was sad.

Definition: A grade is a score or mark given to someone’s work.
Example: I managed to get good grades on my report card.

Definition: Instead means in place of.
Example: He ate the carrot instead of the ice cream.

Definition: A library is a place where you go to read books.
Example: The library at school is full of books.

Definition: I like taking photographs.
Example: I took this photograph with my cell phone.

Definition: A planet is a large round thing in space.
Example: Saturn is the planet with the ring around it.

Definition: A report is something someone writes for school or work.
Example: Karen had trouble writing her report.

Definition: Several is more than two but not many.
Example: He had to read several books for class.

Definition: An object’s shape is the arrangement of its sides and surfaces.
Example: Even with your eyes closed you can feel the shape of it.

Definition: To solve something is to find an answer to it.
Example: All the students could easily solve the math problem.

Definition: If something happens suddenly, it happens quickly and unexpectedly.
Example: I was surprised when my friends suddenly shouted, “Happy birthday!”

Definition: To suppose is to guess.
Example: I suppose I should go home now.

Definition: To understand something you need to know what it means.
Example: Henry could not understand the message.

Definition: To view is to look at something.
Example: Michael likes to view himself in the mirror.

Definition: When a thing is appropriate, it is right or normal.
Example: It’s appropriate to wear a suit when you go to the office.

Definition: To avoid something is to stay away from it.
Example: Avoid the broken bottle on the floor.

Definition: To behave is to act in a particular way, especially to be good.
Example: She always behaves well when her father is around.

Definition: When someone is calm, they do not get excited or upset.
Example: A nice warm bath makes me feel so calm.

Definition: Concern is a feeling of worry.
Example: I was filled with concern after reading the newspaper.

Definition: To be content is to be happy and not want more.
Example: The baby looked very content sitting on the floor.

Definition: If you expect something to happen, you believe it will happen.
Example: I expect the bus to be here very soon.

Definition: When something happens frequently, it happens often.
Example: We meet frequently, either at the beginning or end of the week.

Definition: A habit is a thing that you do often.
Example: Smoking is a bad habit that can kill you.

Definition: To instruct is to teach.
Example: My teacher instructs us in several subjects.

Definition: An issue is an important topic.
Example: The men spoke about issues that were important to the people.

Definition: None means not any of something.
Example: He spent all his money. There is none left.

Definition: If people are patient, they don’t become angry or upset easily.
Example: I had to be patient and wait until 5 o’clock to leave.

Definition: If something is positive, it is good.
Example: She has a positive future ahead of her after finishing college.

Definition: To punish means to make someone suffer for breaking the rules or laws.
Example: To punish me, my teacher had me stand in the corner.

Definition: To represent is to speak or act for a person or group.
Example: My lawyer will represent me in court.

Definition: To shake is to move back and forth or up and down quickly.
Example: When people shake hands, it usually means they agree.

Definition: To spread is to move out to cover a larger area.
Example: I like to spread butter on my toast.

Definition: To stroll means to walk slowly and calmly.
Example: My dog and I strolled through the park today.

Definition: A village is a very small town.
Example: There are only a few houses in my village.

Definition: When someone is active, they move a lot or have a lot of things to do.
Example: It is important to be active and not sit around all the time.

Definition: An adult is a person who is more than 18 years old.
Example: My mom and dad are adults.

Definition: Age is how many years someone has lived.
Example: She died at the age of 80.

Definition: When something is bad, it is not good.
Example: She is unhappy because she had a bad day.

Definition: Balance is when two or more things are equal.
Example: A good balance between work and fun helps keep you healthy.

Definition: A bike is a vehicle with two wheels powered by a human.
Example: He rides his bike to school every day.

Definition: To choose is to pick something or make a decision.
Example: I have to choose between taking art classes and sports lessons.

Definition: A doctor is a person who studies medicine and helps sick people.
Example: You should go to the doctor when you are sick.

Definition: During an event means while the event was happening.
Example: Did you sleep during the movie?

Definition: Football is a sport with eleven members and an oval-shaped ball.
Example: Football is a popular sport in the United States.

Definition: When something is fun, it is enjoyable.
Example: We had a fun time at the birthday party.

Definition: A game is an activity where people compete against each other.
Example: Let’s play a board game tonight.

Definition: A heart is an organ that keeps the body alive.
Example: My heart beats fast when I am nervous.

Definition: Golf is a sport with clubs and a small white ball.
Example: People play golf in nice weather.

Definition: To increase is to make something larger.
Example: I will increase my score if I study for the test.

Definition: Life is the time when a person is alive.
Example: My grandfather had a long life.

Definition: A kilometer is a unit of measurement that is 1,000 meters.
Example: A marathon is 42.2 kilometers.

Definition: Often is when something happens many times.
Example: He often goes to bed early during the week.

Definition: If you have plenty of something, there is a lot of it.
Example: We have plenty of fruit, so help yourself.

Definition: Weight is how heavy something or someone is.
Example: I gained weight because I ate a lot of pizza.

Definition: When people or things are apart, they are not next to each other.
Example: They moved apart and then came back together.

Definition: An attribute is a characteristic of a person or thing.
Example: He isn’t very clever, but he does have some other positive attributes.

Definition: A bilingual person can speak two languages.
Example: Since you already know English, after learning French you’ll be bilingual.

Definition: Something completely different is very, very different from before.
Example: I was completely wrong.

Definition: To dash means to run or move quickly.
Example: Helen dashed up the stairs so she wouldn’t be late for her appointment.

Definition: Disgust is a feeling of distaste and anger caused by something rude or unpleasant.
Example: He felt disgust toward his date because she had such terrible eating habits.

Definition: Something fashionable is what people like to wear and do now.
Example: It is very fashionable to wear a hat.

Definition: Something foreign is something we are not used to.
Example: He has travelled widely in foreign countries.

Definition: A gulf is a gap between people who do not understand each other.
Example: There has been a gulf between James and Tony since their parents died.

Definition: A mirror is usually made of glass, and you can see yourself in it.
Example: He used the mirror to shine light in their eyes.

Definition: Things that are natural are not made by people.
Example: We need to take care of the natural world.

Definition: Nowadays means at the present time.
Example: Nowadays, not so many people smoke.

Definition: A participant is someone who joins in a social event or competition.
Example: There were thousands of participants in this year’s marathon.

Definition: A ritual is a formal custom that people do regularly.
Example: Ken was very interested to learn about the religious rituals of the natives.

Definition: Spoken language is what we say.
Example: We cannot take back what has been spoken.

Definition: Sport involves games like running, jumping, football, and tennis.
Example: She loves watching sport on TV.

Definition: You are surprised when something unexpected happens.
Example: He didn’t appear at all surprised when he read the article.

Definition: When you are tense, you are not comfortable and feel unhappy.
Example: I felt very tense waiting to hear the result of the vote.

Definition: If you totally agree, you agree with everything just said.
Example: I am totally against that.

Definition: If something is vague, it is not clear and gives very few details.
Example: I asked him about his mother’s health, but he was very vague about it.

Definition: To allow something to happen means to let it happen.
Example: Having a ticket will allow you to enter the show.

Definition: To announce something is to make it known.
Example: He announced to everyone his new idea for the company.

Definition: Someone or something beside you is next to you.
Example: The two brothers stood beside each other.

Definition: A challenge is something difficult to complete.
Example: It was a challenge to climb to the top of the mountain.

Definition: To claim means to say that something is true.
Example: He claimed to know why the country’s laws were weak.

Definition: The condition of someone or something is the state that they are in.
Example: The patient’s condition was very good.

Definition: To contribute to something means to do something to make it successful.
Example: We decided to contribute money to the new hospital.

Definition: A difference is a way that something is not like other things.
Example: The biggest difference between the birds is the color of their feathers.

Definition: To divide something is to split it into smaller parts.
Example: We divided the pizza.

Definition: An expert is someone who is very good at doing something.
Example: The wizard was an expert at magic.

Definition: A famous person or thing is well known.
Example: The Eiffel Tower in Paris is very famous.

Definition: Force is a person’s strength or power.
Example: He used all his force to try and open the door.

Definition: To cause harm is to hurt someone or damage something.
Example: A hot iron can cause great harm if you are not careful.

Definition: To lay means to put or place in a horizontal or flat position.
Example: Don’t lay your socks on the floor.

Definition: Peace is a time without war.
Example: A white dove is a symbol of peace.

Definition: A prince is the son of a king.
Example: The prince and the princess were married.

Definition: To protect someone is to stop them from getting hurt.
Example: Firemen protect us from fires.

Definition: To sense something is to know about it without being told.
Example: I could sense that he was watching me.

Definition: When something is sudden, it happens very quickly.
Example: He felt a sudden pain in his chest.

Definition: Therefore means for this reason.
Example: He is fat. Therefore, he should go on a diet.

Definition: To accept something that is offered is to take it.
Example: I accepted the girl’s very nice gift.

Definition: To arrange things is to put them in the right place.
Example: Please arrange the words in order from A to Z.

Definition: To attend something is to go to it.
Example: My sister and I attend the same school.

Definition: You chase people when you run after them and try to catch them.
Example: I was chased by a dog.

Definition: A contrast is a sharp difference between two things.
Example: The contrast between my parents is very noticeable.

Definition: To encourage people is to make them want to do something.
Example: My football coach will encourage us when we are losing.

Definition: People or things familiar to you are those you know well.
Example: The two friends were very familiar with each other.

Definition: To grab is to take a hold of someone or something suddenly.
Example: I grabbed a pear from the tree.

Definition: To hang something is to keep it above the ground.
Example: I drew a picture of my family, and my mother hung it on the wall.

Definition: If something is huge, it is very big.
Example: At work, my father drives a huge truck.

Definition: If something is necessary, you must do it.
Example: A passport is necessary if you travel to other countries.

Definition: A pattern is a way in which something is done or organized.
Example: My pattern of brushing my teeth is the same as most people’s.

Definition: To propose something is to say that it should be done.
Example: My grandmother proposed that we have our picture taken with Santa.

Definition: A purpose is the reason that you do something.
Example: The purpose of exercising is to get into shape.

Definition: To release something is to stop holding it.
Example: She released the bird from her hands.

Definition: To require something is to say that it is necessary.
Example: We require teachers to have a university degree.

Definition: You are satisfied when you have what you wanted.
Example: I am very satisfied with your work.

Definition: If something is single, then there is only one.
Example: I have a single key in my hand.

Definition: To tear something means to pull it apart.
Example: It is easy to tear paper.

Definition: A theory is an idea about how something works.
Example: We talked about Einstein’s theory of relativity in class.

Definition: An animal is a living thing that can move.
Example: My favorite animal is the panda.

Definition: A bus is a large vehicle that people travel on.
Example: My father takes the bus to work.

Definition: A cat is a small animal related to lions and tigers that is kept as a pet.
Example: This cat is playing with a ball.

Definition: A command is an order given to a person or animal to do something.
Example: Joe gave the students a command to stand up.

Definition: To depend on something is to need it for support or help.
Example: My grandfather depends on a cane when he walks.

Definition: A dog is an animal with four legs and a tail that is kept as a pet or trained to work.
Example: This woman’s best friend is her dog.

Definition: A door is an object that swings or slides open and shut.
Example: Can you close the door, please?

Definition: A friend is someone a person knows and likes spending time with.
Example: Brian’s friend is very sad.

Definition: To hear is to be aware of sound through your ears.
Example: Michelle cannot hear what you are saying.

Definition: To help is to do something that makes something easier for someone else.
Example: Jane can help Nathan climb up the rock.

Definition: A horse is a big, strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things.
Example: I went to a farm and saw a horse.

Definition: A hospital is where sick or hurt people receive care or treatment.
Example: The doctor talks to a patient at the hospital.

Definition: A leg is a body part used for standing and walking.
Example: She hurt her leg.

Definition: Medical means related to the treatment of an injury or disease.
Example: Tyler is a medical student studying to become a doctor.

Definition: To open is to move something so that an opening is not covered.
Example: Amy likes to open the window to let fresh air in.

Definition: To pull is to hold onto something to move it toward you.
Example: The children pull the rope.

Definition: A rabbit is a small animal with long ears that lives in a hole in the ground.
Example: Look at the rabbit in the park.

Definition: A school is a place where children go to learn.
Example: The students study at school.

Definition: To see is to use your eyes to look at something or someone.
Example: Steven does not want to see the scary picture.

Definition: Service is the act of helping or serving someone.
Example: This coffee shop has excellent service.

Definition: A benefit is a good thing.
Example: Being able to fly is a benefit to birds.

Definition: If you are certain about something, you know it is true.
Example: I am certain that zebras have stripes.

Definition: A chance is an opportunity to do something.
Example: I had a chance to see the Coliseum in Rome last summer.

Definition: An effect is a change made by something else.
Example: The medicine had a good effect on the boy.

Definition: If something is essential, it is very important and necessary.
Example: It is essential to have oxygen when you scuba dive.

Definition: If something is far, it is not close.
Example: It’s far from the east coast to the west coast of America.

Definition: To focus on something is to think about it and pay attention to it.
Example: My mom always helps me to focus on my school work.

Definition: The function of something is what it does.
Example: The function of a flashlight is to help you see in the dark.

Definition: Grass is the green leaves that cover the ground.
Example: The grass looked so soft and green.

Definition: To guard something is to take care of it.
Example: The police officer will guard us from any harm.

Definition: The image of something is a picture of it.
Example: The image of her eye was very clear.

Definition: If something is immediate, it happens quickly.
Example: An immediate response came from the pizza place.

Definition: If something is primary, it is the most important thing.
Example: His primary thoughts are about money.

Definition: People who feel proud are happy about what they have done.
Example: She is proud of the picture she drew of her house.

Definition: To remain somewhere is to stay there.
Example: My sister had to remain home since she was sick.

Definition: To rest is to stop being active while the body gets back its strength.
Example: I rested on the couch after work.

Definition: If two things are separate, they are not together.
Example: New York and Los Angeles are in two separate parts of America.

Definition: A site is a place.
Example: We found the perfect site for our picnic.

Definition: A tail is a part of an animal’s body that sticks out from its rear or back.
Example: Our dog wags its tail when it’s happy.

Definition: Trouble is a problem or a difficulty.
Example: I have trouble working with my boss.

Definition: To advertise is to describe or draw attention to a product or event by using a public medium.
Example: The woman started a new company and needed to advertise her products.

Definition: If someone is aware, they know that something or a situation exists.
Example: The student became aware that the teacher was watching him.

Definition: A battery is an object placed inside something to supply it with electricity.
Example: My brother needs a battery for his clock.

Definition: Black is the darkest color.
Example: Our street is black at night because there are no street lights.

Definition: A city is a place where a lot of people live.
Example: Tokyo is a very big city in Japan.

Definition: To clean is to make something neat and tidy.
Example: I clean our kitchen every Saturday.

Definition: A country is an area of land with the same government and laws.
Example: France is a country in Europe.

Definition: To develop is to make something larger or more advanced.
Example: This practice will help you develop your math skills.

Definition: If something is electric, it uses electricity.
Example: Some car companies make electric cars.

Definition: When something happens at a later time or in the end, it happens eventually.
Example: He will eventually move to London to find a new job.

Definition: A fact is a piece of information that is true.
Example: A fact about South America is that it is a continent.

Definition: Glass is a transparent, breakable material.
Example: Windows are made of glass.

Definition: History is the study of the past.
Example: History was my favorite subject in school.

Definition: Nature is everything in the physical world that is not made by people.
Example: On the weekends, I love to walk in nature among the trees.

Definition: Never is when something is impossible or will not happen.
Example: They never eat meat because they are vegetarians.

Definition: People are humans.
Example: How many people live in China?

Definition: Plastic is a material made by people.
Example: Many drinks are sold in plastic bottles.

Definition: A problem is a situation when something goes wrong.
Example: My problem is that I lost my dog.

Definition: A street is a road in a city or village.
Example: What is the name of the street you live on?

Definition: To think is to have an opinion or thought about something.
Example: I think summer is the best season.

Definition: A person who is alone is not with another person.
Example: The boy wanted to be alone to think.

Definition: An apartment is a set of rooms in a building where people live.
Example: She has a nice apartment in the city.

Definition: An article is a story in a newspaper or magazine.
Example: Did you read the article in the newspaper about the soccer game?

Definition: An artist is a person who paints, draws, or makes sculptures.
Example: He went to Paris to become an artist.

Definition: Someone’s attitude is the way they feel and think.
Example: John has a bad attitude. He’s always angry.

Definition: Beauty is the state or quality of being beautiful.
Example: I heard my mother was a great beauty when she was young.

Definition: To compare means to say how two things are the same and different.
Example: If you compare cats and dogs, you’ll see that they’re both good pets.

Definition: To judge something is to say if it is good or bad.
Example: The boy was going to judge how his mother’s turkey tasted.

Definition: A magazine is a regular publication with news, stories, and articles.
Example: She likes to read fashion magazines.

Definition: A material is what is used to make something.
Example: Brick is a good material for building houses.

Definition: A meal is a time when food is eaten, such as breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
Example: Breakfast is my favorite meal because I enjoy cereal.

Definition: A method is the way to do something.
Example: One method to remember things is to tie a string around your finger.

Definition: A neighbor is a person who lives near you.
Example: I like my neighbor because he’s very friendly.

Definition: If something is professional, it deals with work that uses special skills.
Example: If you want to be a pilot, you must have professional training.

Definition: A profit is the extra money you make when you sell something.
Example: I made a small profit from selling my old clothes.

Definition: The quality of something is how good it is.
Example: The quality of his car is very good.

Definition: A space is an empty area.
Example: I don’t have much space for things in my small house.

Definition: Stairs are the things that are used to walk up or down in a building.
Example: You can take the stairs to the second floor.

Definition: A symbol is a thing that stands for something else.
Example: This symbol tells us that we cannot smoke in this area.

Definition: If someone or something is thin, they are not fat.
Example: The man was thin because he didn’t eat much.

Definition: People study accounting so they can deal with money and finance properly.
Example: He works for an accounting firm.

Definition: To appeal to someone is to be interesting or attractive.
Example: Sleeping all day appeals to me, but I have to go to school.

Definition: To assume something is to think that it is true, even with no proof.
Example: I assume you are both familiar with this plan.

Definition: To borrow something is to take it and then give it back later.
Example: Can I borrow a pencil to use today? I’ll give it back to you tomorrow.

Definition: A client is a person or business that pays another to do a service.
Example: She has many clients who enjoy coming to her salon.

Definition: The downtown area is the center of most cities.
Example: The downtown area is filled with many tall buildings.

Definition: If something is dull, it is not exciting.
Example: The movie was very dull. I fell asleep watching it.

Definition: To embarrass people is to make them feel ashamed or foolish.
Example: He was embarrassed when he couldn’t remember her name.

Definition: A fare is an amount of money paid to use a bus, train, or taxi.
Example: Since he is a senior, my grandfather pays a low fare for the bus.

Definition: Former describes something that used to be but is not anymore.
Example: The hotel, a former castle, was built over 200 years ago.

Definition: To found a company or organization means to start it.
Example: The Pilgrims founded one of the first colonies in the United States.

Definition: To invest means to use money in a way that will bring a profit later.
Example: I invested money in a new building that should bring me a profit.

Definition: A loan is something, usually money, that one person lends to another.
Example: I got a loan from the bank.

Definition: If something is practical, it is useful.
Example: Learning English is practical; you can use it in many places.

Definition: A quarter is 1/4 or 25% of something.
Example: He paid a quarter for the candy.

Definition: A salary is how much money a person makes at his or her job.
Example: He got a new job with a better salary.

Definition: A scholarship is money given so someone can go to school.
Example: I got a scholarship to help me pay for university.

Definition: If something is temporary, it exists for a short time.
Example: This car is only temporary; I’ll get a new one soon.

Definition: A treasure is a collection of valuable things, especially jewels or gold.
Example: They became very rich when they found the buried treasure.

Definition: To urge someone is to try very hard to get them to do something.
Example: He urged them to believe his story.

Definition: A coach is a person who teaches sports.
Example: My coach gets very excited during games.

Definition: To control something is to make it do what you want.
Example: To control the TV, just push the buttons.

Definition: A description of someone or something says what they are like.
Example: I gave a description of the man with the gun and hat to the police.

Definition: If something is direct, it goes straight between two places.
Example: The green path is a direct route to my house.

Definition: An exam is a test.
Example: I did some practice questions for the math exam on the board.

Definition: An example of something is a thing that is typical of it.
Example: Cola is an example of a soft drink.

Definition: A limit is the largest or smallest amount of something that you allow.
Example: My mother put a limit on how much I could use the phone.

Definition: If something is local, it is nearby.
Example: The local market in my neighborhood sells all the food we need.

Definition: Magical describes a quality that makes someone or something special.
Example: The fireworks made the night sky look so magical.

Definition: Mail is letters and other things sent to people.
Example: I get a lot of mail because I have friends all over the world.

Definition: A novel is a book that tells a story.
Example: He wrote a great novel about ancient China.

Definition: An outline is the plan for a story or essay.
Example: Before I wrote my essay, I made an outline.

Definition: A poet is a person who writes poems.
Example: William Shakespeare was one of the greatest poets.

Definition: To print something is to put it onto paper.
Example: Make sure that you print your name clearly.

Definition: A scene is one part of a book or movie.

Definition: A beautiful thing is good to look at.
Example: There was a beautiful sunset.

Definition: Breadth is the distance from one side to the other side of something.
Example: The breadth of the northern wall of the house is twenty meters.

Definition: A comet is an object in space made of ice and rock with a tail of glowing dust.
Example: Comets take many decades to complete an orbit around a star.

Definition: To cover something is to put things over it.
Example: The Earth was covered with clouds.

Definition: Despair is the feeling of having no hope.
Example: After we lost the big account, our salespeople were filled with despair.

Definition: To form is to make or to shape something.
Example: They formed a new government.

Definition: A fragment is a small part of something.
Example: After the light broke, there were fragments of glass to clean up.

Definition: A galaxy is an extremely large collection of star systems.
Example: Our solar system is located in the outer area of our galaxy.

Definition: Gloom is a state of almost complete darkness or sadness.
Example: In the gloom of the morning, it was difficult to see the boat on the lake.

Definition: Something large is very big.
Example: I was frightened by a large bird.

Definition: The moon is an object that travels around our Earth.
Example: The moon looks beautiful tonight.

Definition: To radiate means to send out energy or heat.
Example: The heat from the fireplace radiated throughout the room.

Definition: To roam means to move around without a plan or purpose.

Definition: A solitary thing is lonely or the only one.

Definition: The spectrum is the full range of color ranging from red to violet.

Definition: A sphere is a three-dimensional round shape, like a ball.
Example: The balloons were inflated into a variety of colorful spheres.

Definition: A star is a bright shining thing in the night sky.
Example: The stars come out at night.

Definition: Status is the position of something or someone in relation to others.

Definition: Something ugly is not good to look at.
Example: It was an ugly sight.

Definition: To accuse someone of something is to blame them for doing it.
Example: She accused her brother of breaking her computer.

Definition: To adjust something means to change it so it is better.
Example: He adjusted the old guitar to make it sound better.

Definition: To amuse someone means to do something that is funny or entertaining.
Example: The singer was very good. She amused the crowd.

Definition: Coral is the hard, colorful material formed by the shells of animals.

Definition: Cotton is a cloth made from the fibers of the cotton plant.
Example: I like to wear clothes made from cotton in the summer.

Definition: To crash means to hit and break something.

Definition: A deck is a wooden floor built outside of a house or the floor of a ship.

Definition: To engage in something means to do it.

Definition: A firm thing is solid but not too hard.

Definition: Fuel is something that creates heat or energy.

Definition: Something grand is big and liked by people.

Definition: A hurricane is a bad storm that happens over the ocean.

Definition: A loss is the act or instance of losing something.

Definition: A plain thing is simple and not decorated.

Definition: A reef is a group of rocks or coral in the ocean.

Definition: To shut something means to close it tightly.

Definition: A strict person makes sure others follow rules.

Definition: To surf means to use a special board to ride on waves in the ocean.

Definition: A task is a piece of work to be done that is usually difficult.

Definition: A zone is an area that has different qualities from the ones around it.

Definition: An apology is what people say to show that they are sorry.

Definition: A bold person is not afraid of doing something.

Definition: A bug is a small insect.

Definition: To capture something is to catch and hold it.
Example: James tried to capture the bubbles in his hands.

Definition: A duke is a man of high social rank but below a king or queen.

Definition: To expose is to make known something that is hidden.

Definition: Guilty people feel bad for something they did.
Example: I felt guilty for taking my sister’s cookies.

Definition: To hire someone is to pay that person money to work for you.

Definition: An innocent person is not guilty of a crime.

Definition: A language is a system of communication.
Example: The reporter spoke a language Sally had never heard before.

Definition: A minister is an important person in government with many duties.

Definition: Ordinary means normal, or not special in any way.
Example: Today was just an ordinary day. Nothing unusual happened.

Definition: Something permanent lasts for a long time or forever.

Definition: To preserve is to protect something from harm.
Example: Dad sprayed a chemical on the house to help preserve the walls.

Definition: To pronounce is to say the sounds of letters or words.

Definition: To resemble someone is to look like that person.

Definition: A symptom of a bad condition or illness is a sign that it is happening.

Definition: Tobacco is a plant whose leaves are smoked, such as in cigarettes.
Example: The tobacco in cigarettes is bad for you.

Definition: Twins are two children born at the same time.
Example: My sister and I are twins. We look exactly the same.

Definition: A witch is a woman with magical powers.
Example: People think that witches fly around on broomsticks.

Definition: To accompany other people means to join them or go with them.

Definition: A bare thing is plain and not covered.
Example: He likes to walk around in his bare feet.

Definition: A branch is the part of a tree with leaves.

Definition: A breath is the air that goes into and out of one’s lungs.
Example: You can’t take a breath under water.

Definition: A bridge is something that is built over a river so people can cross it.

Definition: To cast something means to throw it.
Example: The fisherman cast his line into the water.

Definition: To dare means to be brave enough to try something.
Example: He dared to jump out of the airplane and skydive.

Definition: An electronic thing uses electricity to work.
Example: I like having electronic devices such as an MP3 player.

Definition: An inn is a place where travelers can rest and eat.

Definition: A net is a bag made of strong thread. It is used to catch animals.

Definition: A philosophy is a way to think about truth and life.
Example: My philosophy is “live and let live.”

Definition: A pot is a deep, round metal container used for cooking.

Definition: A seed is the hard part of a plant or fruit that trees grow from.
Example: I planted the seed in the dirt, hoping that it would grow into a tree.

Definition: A sharp object has a thin edge that cuts things easily.
Example: That knife is very sharp. Be careful not to hurt yourself.

Definition: A sort of something is a type of it.

Definition: To subtract means to take something away.

Definition: A tight thing is hard to move because it is firmly in place.

Definition: A virtual thing is very close to being true or accurate.

Definition: To weigh something means to measure how heavy it is.

Definition: To whisper means to say very quietly.

Definition: An abstract thing is an idea or thought, not a physical thing.

Definition: An annual event happens once a year.
Example: The only time I see my aunts and uncles is at our annual family picnic.

Definition: Clay is a type of heavy, wet soil used to make pots.

Definition: Cloth is material used to make clothes.
Example: His shirt is made of a very soft type of cloth.

Definition: A curtain is a cloth hung over a window or used to divide a room.

Definition: To deserve is to be worthy of something as a result of one’s actions.

Definition: Feathers are the things covering a bird’s bodies.
Example: That bird has orange feathers on its chest.

Definition: Fertile land is able to produce good crops and plants.

Definition: A flood is an event in which water covers an area that is usually dry.

Definition: Furniture means the things used in a house such as tables and chairs.

Definition: A grave is the place where a dead person is buried.

Definition: An ideal thing is the best that it can possibly be.

Definition: Intelligence is the ability to learn and understand things.

Definition: To obtain is to get something you want or need.

Definition: Religious means related to or about religion.

Definition: Romantic means related to or about love.
Example: The young couple went to see a romantic movie.

Definition: A shell is a hard covering that protects the body of some sea creatures.

Definition: A shore is the edge of a large body of water.

Definition: A wheel is a round thing on a vehicle that turns when it moves.

Definition: Wooden objects are made of wood.
Example: My mother gave me a wooden spoon.

Definition: An appliance is a piece of equipment used for jobs in the home.

Definition: A basin is large bowl for washing things. A sink is sometimes called a basin.

Definition: A broom is a brush with a long handle used for cleaning floors.

Definition: A caterpillar is a small insect that looks like a worm and eats plants.

Definition: A cupboard is a piece of furniture that is used to store food or household items.

Definition: Delicate things are easy to break or harm.

Definition: To emerge from something means to come out of it.

Definition: A handicap is a condition that limits someone’s mental or physical abilities.

Definition: A hook is a sharp curved piece of metal used for catching or holding things.

Definition: To hop means to jump a short distance.

Definition: Laundry is clothes that have been or need to be washed.

Definition: To pursue is to chase or follow someone or something.

Definition: Reluctant means not wanting to do something.

Definition: Sleeves are the part of a shirt in which arms go.

Definition: The spine is the group of bones that run up and down the middle of the back.

Definition: A stain is a dirty mark that is difficult to clean.

Definition: A strip is a long, narrow piece of material or land.

Definition: To swear means to promise to do something.

Definition: To swing something means to move it back and forth or from side to side.

Definition: An acre is a unit for measuring area.

Definition: The afterlife is a life that some people believe begins when a person dies.

Definition: Archaeology is the study of the remains left by ancient societies.

Definition: A chamber is a closed space or room used for a special purpose.

Definition: A channel is a long, deep space between two edges.

Definition: A core is the main or central part of something.

Definition: A corridor is a narrow passage that leads into other areas.

Definition: A distinct thing is different or stands out.

Definition: Elite means of or from a high-level group.

Definition: To engineer something is to skillfully plan out how to make that thing.

Definition: To found something means to start, organize, or establish that thing.

Definition: A gap is a space between two things.

Definition: Glory is the importance, magnificence, or specialness of something.

Definition: An interior is the inside of something.

Definition: A lion is a large animal in the cat family.

Definition: A role is a job, position, or part in something.

Definition: Royal means related to a king or queen.

Definition: A sole person or thing is the only one.

Definition: Stairs are a set of steps built to go from one level of a building to another.

Definition: The surface is the top layer of something.

Definition: To arise is to happen.

Definition: A benefactor is a person who gives money to help someone.

Definition: A chimney is a tall pipe used to carry smoke out of a building.

Definition: To encounter is to find or meet a person or thing.

Definition: People who are humble do not believe that they are better than other people.

Definition: Iron is a strong metal that is used to make many objects.

Definition: A ladder is an object that is used to climb up and down things.

Definition: If people are modest, they do not think that they are too important.

Definition: To occupy a place is to live, work, or be there.

Definition: To prosper is to be successful or make a lot of money.

Definition: A province is an area that is controlled by a country.

Definition: Satisfaction is the feeling of having done or received something good.

Definition: To sustain something is to keep it going.

Definition: A lodge is a house in the mountains used by people who hunt or fish.

Definition: A newcomer is a person who has recently arrived at a place or a group.

Definition: A ridiculous thing is silly or strange.

Definition: A satisfactory thing is good enough.

Definition: A shepherd is a person who protects and cares for sheep.

Definition: Wheat is a plant from which we get the grain used to make bread.

Definition: An ax is a tool used to cut wood.

Definition: A bunch is a group of the same things.

Definition: A decent person or thing is OK or good enough.

Definition: Disgraceful behavior is behavior that is very bad.

Definition: The elbow is the middle part of an arm, where it bends.

Definition: A grateful person feels thankful about something.

Definition: To irritate means to annoy someone.

Definition: An overnight action happens during the night.

Definition: To persist means to keep doing something even when it is hard.

Definition: A pine is a type of tall, thin tree with needles instead of leaves.

Definition: A scar is a mark on the skin after a wound heals.

Definition: A sensation is a feeling that people get from their senses.

Definition: A sled is a small vehicle used on snow.

Definition: To tease means to laugh at or make fun of someone.

Definition: A valentine is someone loved or admired with great affection.

Definition: To acquaint is to get to know something or someone.

Definition: A cemetery is a place where people are buried when they die.

Definition: A creature is an animal or person.

Definition: To curse someone is to hope that bad things happen to that person.

Definition: A disguise is something you wear so people cannot tell who you are.

Definition: A fancy thing is nicer or more detailed than normal.

Definition: A flashlight is a small electric light that people carry in their hands.

Definition: A hood is part of a coat that goes over a person’s head.

Definition: An inhabitant is a person who lives in a certain place.

Definition: To nourish is to give someone or something the food needed to live.

Definition: A pirate is a sailor who steals things from other boats.

Definition: A publication is something printed, like a newspaper or book.

Definition: A riddle is a question that is difficult to answer but meant to be funny.

Definition: To rot is to slowly get softer and become destroyed.

Definition: An action that happens shortly happens very soon.

Definition: A skeleton is all the bones of a body.

Definition: To spoil is to rot or to make bad.

Definition: To starve is to not get enough food for a long period of time.

Definition: A thrill is an exciting feeling.

Definition: A wicked person is very bad or evil.

Definition: To alert someone is to tell or warn that person about something.

Definition: A broadcast is a television or radio show.

Definition: A bulletin is a news report about very recent and important events.

Definition: A bump is a small raised area on a surface.

Definition: To chop something means to cut it into pieces with a tool.

Definition: A closet is a small room used to store things.

Definition: To console is to give comfort to a person who feels sad.

Definition: A district is a small part of a city, county, state, or country.

Definition: A drawer is a small part in furniture that is used to store things.

Definition: To endure means to experience and survive something difficult.

Definition: To execute means to kill someone as a legal punishment.

Definition: To grasp something means to hold it.

Definition: The rear of something is the back part of that thing.
Example: The man loaded the rear of his truck with boxes.

Definition: A senator is someone who makes laws for a state.

Definition: A skull is the hard head bone that protects the brain.
Example: The brain is protected by the skull.

Definition: To stir something means to mix it using something small, like a spoon.

Definition: To tap something is to hit it lightly.

Definition: A tremendous thing is very large or very good.

Definition: Underneath means below or under.

Definition: A worm is a small animal with a long, thin body.

Definition: To abandon something is to leave it forever or for a long time.

Definition: An ambitious person wants to be rich or successful.

Definition: To bark is to make a short, loud noise, like a dog.

Definition: A bay is an area near the ocean where the land goes inward.

Definition: A brilliant person is very bright or smart.
Example: My younger sister is brilliant for someone her age.

Definition: A chin is the hard part at the bottom of a person’s face.

Definition: A complaint is an expression of unhappiness about something.
Example: Mom said she didn’t want to hear my brother’s complaints.

Definition: A deaf person or animal cannot hear.
Example: Susan uses sign language because she is deaf.

Definition: An enthusiastic person is excited by or interested in something.
Example: The man was enthusiastic about his job.

Definition: An expedition is a long trip, usually to a place very far away.

Definition: The horizon is where the sky looks like it meets the ground.

Definition: Loyal people always help or support a certain person or thing.

Definition: The mayor is the person in charge of a city.

Definition: A mutual thing is felt in the same way by two or more people.

Definition: Overweight people or animals are heavier than is healthy.

Definition: To restore something is to put it back the way it was.

Definition: To rub something is to push on it and move your hand back and forth.

Definition: The senses are how living things experience the world: sight, taste, smell, hearing and touch.

Definition: A veterinarian is a doctor who takes care of animals.

Definition: An anniversary is a day that celebrates something from the past.
Example: My parents went out to a restaurant for their wedding anniversary.

Definition: Arithmetic is math.
